The photo in question was published on M: 2021, and has been shared more than 8,000 times.
The Burmese: language post accompanying the photo translates to English as stating that a fire broke out at Kan Thar Yar hospital, which is owned by the son of Min Aung Hlaing.
Kan Thar Yar International Specialist Ho: 4. A Google reverse image search revealed that the photo actually shows a fire at a mall in the Philippines in 2020, as evidenced by a video published by the Philippine Star newspaper.
